solution_line_template: The number of children on the bus is {total_passengers} passengers * {children_percent_num}% = <<{total_passengers}*{children_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={num_children}>>{num_children} passengers.
The number of adults on the bus is {total_passengers} passengers - {num_children} passengers = <<{total_passengers}-{num_children}={num_adults}>>{num_adults} passengers.
